survey_name: AI-Powered Mental Wellness App User Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the effectiveness, usability, and satisfaction with AI-powered mental wellness applications to improve future iterations and features.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the AI-powered mental wellness app?
answer_options: This is my first time using it
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use the AI-powered mental wellness app?
answer_options: This is my first time using it

questions.question_text: Which features of the app do you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Allow for an 'Other' option if necessary.

script.question_text: Which features of the app do you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-driven chat support feature?
answer_options: I have not used this feature
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q2 includes 'AI-driven chat support'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Include an option for non-users.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the AI-driven chat support feature?
answer_options: I have not used this feature
script.routing_logic: Show if Q2 includes 'AI-driven chat support'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered mental wellness app?
questions.client_notes: Allow for open-ended responses to capture detailed feedback. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered mental wellness app?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this app to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format. This is a key metric for net promoter score (NPS).

script.question_text: Would you recommend this app to others?
